pkgmetadata.longdescription: A New Type of Test Statistic and Method for Multinomial Goodness- of-Fit Test // Performs multinomial goodness-of-fit test on multinomially distributed data using the Randomized phi- divergence test statistics. Details of this kind of statistics can be found at Nikita Puchkin, Vladimir Ulyanov (2023) doi:10.1214/22-AIHP1299.
